Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

RIB_INTERFACE_ENTRY

The structure RIB_INTERFACE_ENTRY specifies a structure that contains RIB attribute and/or preference information.

struct RIB_INTERFACE_ENTRY
{
  char const * entry_name;
  RIB_ENTRY_TYPE type;
  RIB_DATA_SUBTYPE type;
};

In Members

entry_name
Name of the desired function or attribute.
type
Type of the entry.
type
Variable type of the desired function or attribute.


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Functions: AIL_enumerate_filter_attributes, AIL_enumerate_filter_sample_attributes, AIL_filter_DLS_attribute, AIL_filter_attribute, AIL_filter_sample_attribute, AIL_filter_stream_attribute, AIL_set_filter_DLS_preference, AIL_set_filter_preference, AIL_set_filter_sample_preference, AIL_set_filter_stream_preference
Related Basic Types: RIB_DATA_SUBTYPE, RIB_ENTRY_TYPE, char const *
